pages.text: The $(item)Acceleration Rune$() increases the rate of a couple operations. While normally the operations of the $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_rune/charging_rune)Charging Rune$(/l) and $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_rune/dislocation_rune)Displacement Rune$(/l) occur every 20 ticks, one tick of the delay is removed per rune, down to a minimum of 1 operation per tick.
